meanings.sent1: The unbonded papers slipped out of the folder and scattered on the floor.
meanings.sent2: The unbonded tape failed to hold the pieces together.
meanings.sent3: The unbonded label kept falling off the package, causing confusion.
meanings.sent4: His unbonded promise was easily forgotten and never fulfilled.
meanings.sent5: The unbonded glue couldn't keep the broken pieces of the vase together.
